channel.title: python on tdj28
channel.description: Recent content in python on tdj28

item.title: Headless Python Selenium With Behave
item.description: Selenium Testing a Web App can be a quick and productive win.

item.title: Using PNNL's new Cividis colormap in data science to make accessible heat maps
item.description: Recent work at PNNL has introduced a mathematically optimized colormap called Cividis that optimizes viewing of heatmaps and other plots for both those with and without full color vision

item.title: Exploring Wikipedia Page Count Trends
item.description: There are some readily available tools in python for doing time series analysis, and these tools can be used to study Wikipedia page count stats.

item.title: Python Uses Operational Chaining for Boolean Comparisons
item.description: It is important to understand Python’s use of operational chaining to avoid programming errors.
